script.description: Remove sub-seconds from event.ingested to improve storage efficiency.
Add event.agent_id_status based on the API key metadata and the agent.id contained in the event.
script.source: boolean is_user_trusted(def ctx, def users) {if (ctx?._security?.username == null) {return false;}def user = null;for (def item : users) {if (item?.username == ctx._security.username) {user = item;break;}}if (user == null || user?.realm == null || ctx?._security?.realm?.name == null) {return false;}if (ctx._security.realm.name != user.realm) {return false;}return true;}String verified(def ctx, def params) {if (ctx?.agent?.id == null) {return "missing";}if (ctx?._security?.authentication_type == null|| ctx._security.authentication_type != 'API_KEY'|| !is_user_trusted(ctx, params.trusted_users)|| ctx?._security?.api_key?.metadata?.agent_id == null) {return "auth_metadata_missing";}if (ctx._security.api_key.metadata.agent_id != ctx.agent.id) {return "mismatch";}return "verified";}if (ctx?.event == null) {ctx.event = [:];}ctx.event.agent_id_status = verified(ctx, params);
